# recipients

**Instance Property**

The array of users to receive the message.

## Declaration

```swift
var recipients: [INPerson]? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to identify the intended recipients of the message. During the resolution phase, use the information in each [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPerson] object to resolve the named individual to a specific user of your app.

## Specifying Details About a Message

- **outgoingMessageType**: The format of the message contents.
- **conversationIdentifier**: The identifier for the conversation.
- **speakableGroupName**: The name of the group to receive the message.
- **content**: The content of the message.
- **serviceName**: The service to use when sending the message.
- **sender**: The person or account that’s sending the message.
- **attachments**: Audio files to include in the message.
